mapper.sql: a.id as id ,a.xinxifabu_id as xinxifabuId ,a.yonghu_id as yonghuId ,a.insert_time as insertTime ,a.create_time as createTime
mapper.select:
SELECT
-- 级联表的字段 ,xinxifabu.xinxifabu_name as xinxifabuName ,xinxifabu.xinxifabu_types as xinxifabuTypes ,xinxifabu.xinxifabu_photo as xinxifabuPhoto ,xinxifabu.yonghu_Id as xinxifabuYonghuId ,xinxifabu.xinxifabu_address as xinxifabuAddress ,xinxifabu.chongwu_types as chongwuTypes ,xinxifabu.xinxifabu_time as xinxifabuTime ,xinxifabu.xinxi_types as xinxiTypes ,xinxifabu.xinxifabu_content as xinxifabuContent ,yonghu.yonghu_name as yonghuName ,yonghu.yonghu_id_number as yonghuIdNumber ,yonghu.yonghu_phone as yonghuPhone ,yonghu.yonghu_photo as yonghuPhoto
FROM lingyang a left JOIN xinxifabu xinxifabu ON a.xinxifabu_id = xinxifabu.id left JOIN yonghu yonghu ON a.yonghu_id = yonghu.id
and a.id in
#{item}
and a.xinxifabu_id = #{params.xinxifabuId}
and a.yonghu_id = #{params.yonghuId}
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.insert_time) >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeStart})
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.insert_time) <= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeEnd})
and xinxifabu.xinxifabu_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.xinxifabuName},'%')
and xinxifabu.xinxifabu_types = #{params.xinxifabuTypes}
and xinxifabu.xinxifabu_address like CONCAT('%',#{params.xinxifabuAddress},'%')
and xinxifabu.chongwu_types = #{params.chongwuTypes}
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(xinxifabu.xinxifabu_time) >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.xinxifabuTimeStart})
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(xinxifabu.xinxifabu_time) <= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.xinxifabuTimeEnd})
and xinxifabu.xinxi_types = #{params.xinxiTypes}
and xinxifabu.xinxifabu_content like CONCAT('%',#{params.xinxifabuContent},'%')
and yonghu.yonghu_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuName},'%')
and yonghu.yonghu_id_number like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuIdNumber},'%')
and yonghu.yonghu_phone like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuPhone},'%')
order by a.${params.orderBy} desc
